description: Find out about the heritage assets we're responsible for in London

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We're responsible for hundreds of heritage assets, either statutorily or locally listed, in one of London's four World Heritage Sites or conservation areas."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What we do"}
We manage:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Thames bridges","Street furniture","Commercial and residential buildings","London Overground and TfL Rail stations","More than 100 Underground stations"]}
Our Heritage Advisor gives expert advice to transport projects that affect heritage assets and environments, especially if they need planning permission or negotiation with Historic England .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Examples of our heritage projects"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Bank station capacity upgrade"}
Heritage advice for over-station development taking place as part of major improvements to Bank .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Chiswick Bridge restoration"}
Like-for-like replacement of weathered balusters, strengthened with integral (hidden) steelwork, plus comprehensive refurbishment of 80-year-old Grade II listed bridge.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Crystal Palace station restoration"}
Award-winning £7.5m restoration of Grade II listed station building and ticket hall, new Overground platforms and provision of step-free access.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Cycle Superhighways"}
Hheritage expertise provided for the East-West route which passes along the Victoria Embankment and through Regent's Park, Green Park and Hyde Park.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Overground heritage audit"}
Detailed reports on heritage features and designations on railway lines and stations managed by TfL as part of the London Overground network.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"National Rail/London Rail cycle-rail steering group"}
Rrepresenting TfL on the Network Rail/Rail Delivery Group working group, to integrate heritage into nationwide strategy to improve combined rail and cycling journeys.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Contact us"}
If you have any questions, contact Edmund Bird at edmundbird@tfl.gov.uk .
